title.narrative: Strengthening Pre-Service Education for Nursing and Midwifery Cadre in Bihar

description.narrative:
1: To strengthen the nursing and midwifery education of auxiliary nurse midwife (ANM) and general nursing and midwifery (GNM) students in Bihar by leveraging modern information technology to provide virtual training in the key components of midwifery.
2: To facilitate the up-gradation of the six GNM schools in Bihar to colleges of nursing in order to address the severe shortage of well qualified graduate nurse-midwives in the state.
3: To strengthen the management capacity of Bihar towards the establishment of a functional nursing cell and directorate in the state for the provision of an enabling environment towards the holistic development of nursing-midwifery cadre in the state

Jhpiego, in partnership with CISCO, aims to address the different dimensions and determinants of the quality of Pre-service education in the state, including the quality of teaching through virtual training, initiating the up-gradation process of the schools of nursing into colleges of nursing and thereby increase the number of well qualified and competent nurse-midwives providing health care services in the state. The project facilitates the setting up of a functional nursing and midwifery cell and directorate that serve the administrative needs of the nursing and midwifery cadre in the state thus attempting a holistic quality improvement approach to Pre-service education.

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity
